$validation.slug: The field {_field_} must contain only letters, numbers, _ or -
$validation.url: The field {_field_} must be a valid URL

errors.internal: Something went wrong, please try again later.

home.you_found_us: You met us at the beginning of our journey, register and receive the exclusive badge.
home.after_a_week: After an active week on the site, receive the {0} badge.

signin.title: Sign in
signin.tip: Stay active for one week and earn the {0} badge.
signin.description: Log in and invite friends to start the party!

signup.title: HAVE NOT YET REGISTERED?
signup.tip: If you register now, you will earn the {0} badge, exclusive for those who registered in the alpha phase.
signup.description: Sign up to discover new songs and music genres by participating in the different rooms.

recovery.title: Account recovery
recovery.description: Forgot your password? Don't worry, use your email address and username to recover your account.

success.title: E-mail sent
success.body: We send a recovery link to your email, link validity is 2 hours.

change_password.title: Change password
change_password.confirmation:
Password changed successfully!
Use your new password to login.

room.queue_count: There is no one in the queue | There's 1 people ahead | There's {count} people ahead
room.queue_position: You're next | There is 1 person in front of you | There are {count} people in front of you

stop_playing.title: Stop playing
stop_playing.body: Are you sure you want to stop playing?

leave_queue.title: Leave queue
leave_queue.body: Are you sure you want to leave the queue?

unauthorized.title: Not authorized
unauthorized.body: Your current role in this room does not allow you to perform this action.

multiple_sessions.title: Disconnected
multiple_sessions.body: You have signed in from another window. Refresh the page to continue using here.

disconnected.title: Disconnected
disconnected.body: Could not connect to the server, please refresh the page to try again.

queue_lock.title: Lock queue | Unlock queue
queue_lock.body: Are you sure you want to lock the queue? | Are you sure you want to unlock the queue?

no_room.title: Unable to join any room
no_room.body: Your friend is not in any room.

room_private.title: Unable to join the room
room_private.body: Your friend is in a private room.

missing_birthday.title: Incomplete registration
missing_birthday.body: Your registration does not have a birth date. We use this information to filter rooms based on their age and do not share this data with anyone. To avoid problems, inform your real age as once defined, it will not be possible to change it.

details.title: Details
details.welcome_hint: {user} will be replaced with the user name

clear.title: Clear Queue
clear.body: Are you sure you want to remove all users from the queue?

player.cant_skip: You are not allowed to skip the current media

cannot_play.title: Reproduction not allowed!
cannot_play.body: Your browser requires you to click on the player to start playback.

skip.title: Skip
skip.body: Are you sure you want to skip the current media?

skip_remove.title: Skip and Remove
skip_remove.body: Are you sure you want to skip the current media and remove the DJ from the queue?

playlists.title: Playlists
playlists.create_new: Create a new playlist and access the library to add media

delete_media.title: Delete media
delete_media.body: Are you sure you want to delete {media} from your playlist?

delete_playlist.title: Delete playlist
delete_playlist.body: Are you sure you want to delete the playlist {playlist}?

added.title: Added to playlist
added.body: {title} has been added to your playlist.

youtube.title: Add from Youtube
youtube.link: LINK OF THE VIDEO OR PLAYLIST
youtube.placeholder: Insert here the link for the video or playlist from youtube.

vimeo.title: Add from Vimeo
vimeo.placeholder: Insert here the link for the video from vimeo.

roles.title: Roles and Permissions
roles.description: Add custom roles for this room

delete.title: Remove role
delete.body: Are you sure you want to remove the role {role} from the current room?

remove_user.title: Remove users
remove_user.body: Are you sure you want to remove the selected users from the role {role}?

ALL.title: All permissions
ALL.description: Adds all permissions to the user

ROOM_DETAILS.title: Change room details
ROOM_DETAILS.description: Allows you to change the name, description, link and welcome message.

QUEUE_ADD_REMOVE.title: Add/Remove users from queue
QUEUE_ADD_REMOVE.description: Allows you to add/remove users from the queue

QUEUE_MOVE.title: Control queue
QUEUE_MOVE.description: Allows to move users' positions in queue

QUEUE_JOIN_LOCKED.title: Enter a locked queue
QUEUE_JOIN_LOCKED.description: Allows you to enter the queue even if it is locked

USER_BAN.title: Ban users
USER_BAN.description: Allows you to ban user from the room

USER_UNBAN.title: Unban users
USER_UNBAN.description: Allows you to unban user from the room

USER_KICK.title: Kick users
USER_KICK.description: Allows you to kick users from the room

MANAGE_ROLES.title: Manage roles
MANAGE_ROLES.description: Allows you to manage the roles and permissions of the room

BAN_USER.title: Ban user
BAN_USER.description: Ban a user from the site indefinitely.

MUTE_USER.title: Mute user
MUTE_USER.description: Prevent a user from chatting indefinitely.

BLOCK_DJ.title: Block DJ
BLOCK_DJ.description: Prevents a user from playing in all rooms.

CLOSE_ROOM.title: Close room
CLOSE_ROOM.description: Closes a room on the site indefinitely.

user_ban.title: Ban user
user_ban.body: Are you sure you want to ban user {username} from the room?

user_kick.title: Kick user
user_kick.body: Are you sure you want to kick user {username} from the room?

user_site_ban.title: Ban user from Pubby.club
user_site_ban.body: Are you sure you want to ban user {username} from PUBBY.CLUB?

user_remove.title: Unfriend
user_remove.body: Are you sure you want to unfriend?

body.expires: User {username} banned from the room for {duration}
body.permanent: User {username} banned permanently from the room

user_kicked.title: User kicked
user_kicked.body: You have kicked user {username} from the room

title.ip: User banned by IP from Pubby.club

user_popup.friendship_requests: Friend requests | Friend requests ({count}) | Friend requests ({count})

friendship_request.title: Friend requests
friendship_request.no_requests_description: You have responded to all friend requests.

events.user_ban: {username} has been banned from the room.
events.user_kick: {username} has been kicked from the room.

remove.title: Delete Message
remove.body: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

clear.title: Clear messages
clear.body: Are you sure you want to delete all messages?

user_unban.title: Unban user
user_unban.body: Are you sure you want to unban user {username} from the room?
